tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Dr. Bharwani is the first professor that truly bridges the gap between university and industry. His class will prepare you with the tools necessary to be successful after graduation. He will make you work hard to earn your grade, but doesn\'t expect anything more than an employer would from you.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: One of the worst professors at Wright State. He doesn\'t teach the class, he plays videos of other people, and has students present in class. He doesn\'t seem to have common sense either he expects everyone to understand every industry out there and all the variables that each industry has.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Vague lectures, vague assignment parameters, and a grading system that actually pits students against eachother while he verbally emphasizes teamwork. Student evals of student presentations were a grading element, but when he didn\'t like what people were saying on the evals, he changed the grading to write them out. Avoid wherever possible.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Students teach most of the class with their presentations. Also he gave everyone an incomplete because he could not get all the grades in on time. The sound quality of the lectures were bad and he would not do anything to improve it. We never referenced the required book for the class. Everything he did teach was read straight from the slides. BAD!

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He has students do a ton of presentations, does basically no teaching himself. Lecture audio quality was horrible. Gives essentially no feedback on graded homework, just a bunch of check marks. Gave the entire class an incomplete final grade at first because he couldn\'t grade fast enough before final grades were due. He is a useless professor.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He knows his stuff! He brings up real cases. Very interesting class. Not much homework, case studys in class. Read book before class, graded in class on reading. Open book, open notes exams. Great class!

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He doesn\'t teach much at all. He has the students do numerous presentations teaching the material and grades them on their presentation and their grading of their fellow students presentations. Great if you need to sharpen your presentation skills, but don\'t expect for him to actually teach you anything.
